subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Madison Square Garden
organizations: New York City Basketball Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bender was an all-American player at Columbia whose play during the Depression helped popularize the game and make Madison Square Garden a magnet for college basketball.
snippet: Mr. Bender was an all-American player at Columbia whose play during the Depression helped popularize the game and make Madison Square Garden a magnet for college basketball.
